TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit OpenTypeMethods extends System.Object
public ref class OpenTypeMethods abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Used to perform late-bound operations on open properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This class is used when you implement a custom data service provider for [!INCLUDE[ssAstoria](~/includes/ssastoria-md.md)].
